aka: One Year After According My Grandpa
this_title: Un año después según mi tata
trans_title: One Year After According My Grandpa
introduction: Jorge, 75 years old retired, spend his days watching television on the bed where his wife passed away. His family tries to convence him to take out the bed, but with no response. Finally Jorge will embrase his most vulnerable side by deciding that they can take away the bed.
chinese_title: Un año después según mi tata
